original: @#/_/seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma bstod pa/
analyzed: @#/_/seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma bstod pa/
translated: Praise of Tārā of the Khadira Forest🔽In Sanskrit: Khadirapradīpāstotra

original: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_kha bye ra d+ha ra sto tra/_bod skad du/_seng🔽ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma la bstod pa/_'phags ma seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma la
analyzed: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_kha bye ra d+ha ra sto tra/_bod skad du/_seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma la bstod pa/_'phags ma seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma la
translated: In Tibetan: Seng Ideng nags kyi sgrol ma la bstod pa🔽Homage to Noble Tārā of the Khadira Forest!

original: phyag 'tshhal lo/_/'phags ma'i pho brang seng ldeng nags na sgrol ma rtshe/_/u
analyzed: phyag 'tshhal lo/_/'phags ma'i pho brang seng ldeng nags na sgrol ma rtshe/_/u
translated: When you, Tārā, were in the Noble Lady’s palace, the Khadira Forest,

original: dum wa ra seng ldeng rgya shug n+ya gro ta/_/tshan dan 'bras bu gsum stong dza ti li
analyzed: dum wa ra seng ldeng rgya shug n+ya gro ta/_/tshan dan 'bras bu gsum stong dza ti li
translated: udumbara, khadira, jujube, banyan, sandalwood, the three fruits, and jasmine

original: shi'i tshhal/_/kha zum kha bye me tog shing lo nyams dga'i gnas/_/ljon shing
analyzed: shi'i tshhal/_/kha zum kha bye me tog shing lo nyams dga'i gnas/_/ljon shing
translated: flowers opened and closed, and the leaves of the trees were delightful.🔽The trees had fruits that were ripe, unripe, and in between,

original: 'bras bu smin dang ma smin tam po la/_/yan lag brgyad ldan chu ni lhung lhung sgra🔽snyan la/_/rma bya ne tsho khu byug bzhad rnams sgra snyan sgrogs/_/stag gzig rgyug
analyzed: 'bras bu smin dang ma smin tam po la/_/yan lag brgyad ldan chu ni lhung lhung sgra snyan la/_/rma bya ne tsho khu byug bzhad rnams sgra snyan sgrogs/_/stag gzig rgyug
translated: and the water with the eight qualities was falling with a pleasant sound.🔽Peacocks, geese, cuckoos, and avadavats sang sweetly,🔽and tigers and leopards ran about, and bears and monkeys jumped.

original: cing e nas gar byed dom dred mchongs/_/lce spyang glu len spre spre khri snyan be'u snun/_/
analyzed: cing e nas gar byed dom dred mchongs/_/lce spyang glu len spre spre khri snyan be'u snun/_/
translated: Jackals howled, and thousands of monkeys and monkeys’ wives were delightful.

original: lha'i bu mo gzhon nu nags na drug ldan len/_/dge slong klu grub seng ldeng
analyzed: lha'i bu mo gzhon nu nags na drug ldan len/_/dge slong klu grub seng ldeng
translated: The bhikṣu Nāgabodhi, in the forest of sal trees,

original: nags na grub chen mdzad/_/sgrol ma gshegs bzhud zhing khams gnas la phyag
analyzed: nags na grub chen mdzad/_/sgrol ma gshegs bzhud zhing khams gnas la phyag
translated: The great siddha, I pay homage and praise the field of activity and abode of Tārā, who comes and goes,

original: 'tshhal bstod/_/skye med thugs rje'i mtshho las pad ma mar gad mdog_/me
analyzed: 'tshhal bstod/_/skye med thugs rje'i mtshho las pad ma mar gad mdog_/me
translated: From the lake of unborn compassion, the lotus color of a laughing crystal,

original: seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma la bstod pa
analyzed: seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma la bstod pa
translated: The praise of Tārā of the Forest of Sal Trees

original: tog zla mdzes bud med rin chen bcud kyis mdzes/_/ngang pa'i 'gros ltar
analyzed: tog zla mdzes bud med rin chen bcud kyis mdzes/_/ngang pa'i 'gros ltar
translated: The beautiful moon-like woman, adorned with the essence of jewels,🔽Moving like the gait of a goose, looking like an elephant in rut,

original: bgyid zhing gnyis 'thung dreg bzhin gzigs/_/bde gshegs thugs rje'i rlan🔽gyis gang mos skur ston ma/_/gser gyi pad mas snyan rgyan ud pal dar🔽dpyangs can/_/rin chen rtshe bran dbu la don grub cod pan bzhugs/_/mu
analyzed: bgyid zhing gnyis 'thung dreg bzhin gzigs/_/bde gshegs thugs rje'i rlan gyis gang mos skur ston ma/_/gser gyi pad mas snyan rgyan ud pal dar dpyangs can/_/rin chen rtshe bran dbu la don grub cod pan bzhugs/_/mu
translated: The one who appears in a form moistened by the Sugata's compassion,🔽Adorned with golden lotuses, with hanging utpala flowers,🔽With a crest of jewels on her head, with the crown of Amoghasiddhi,

original: tig btsho ma byu ru'i chun 'phyangs 'gur chu mdzes/_/phyag zhabs gdu gu dpung
analyzed: tig btsho ma byu ru'i chun 'phyangs 'gur chu mdzes/_/phyag zhabs gdu gu dpung
translated: Adorned with a garland of pearls, coral, and turquoise, with arms and legs like tender banana trees,

original: rgyan sku reg dar sgeg ma/_/thugs rje 'khor ba las sgrol phyag na pad mo yis/_/
analyzed: rgyan sku reg dar sgeg ma/_/thugs rje 'khor ba las sgrol phyag na pad mo yis/_/
translated: The goddess of the lotus in his hand, who is beautiful with ornaments, a silken garment, and a lotus,🔽and who is compassionate, liberating beings from cyclic existence,🔽arose from the water of his eyes.

original: spyan gyi chab las lha mo sku 'khrungs 'od dpag med/_/smon lam mthu yis brtshe
analyzed: spyan gyi chab las lha mo sku 'khrungs 'od dpag med/_/smon lam mthu yis brtshe
translated: The power of his aspirations

original: chen gzhan gyi don la brtshon/_/zhing mchog rnam dag seng ldeng nags kyi gzhon
analyzed: chen gzhan gyi don la brtshon/_/zhing mchog rnam dag seng ldeng nags kyi gzhon
translated: is great, and he is intent on the welfare of others.

original: nu ma/_/zhal gyi pad ma yid 'ong bzhin ni zla ltar rgyas/_/chu skyes spyan mdzes🔽dkyus ring dkar nag mdangs gsal ba/_/mgor skyes khur bu gser gyis sgra
analyzed: nu ma/_/zhal gyi pad ma yid 'ong bzhin ni zla ltar rgyas/_/chu skyes spyan mdzes dkyus ring dkar nag mdangs gsal ba/_/mgor skyes khur bu gser gyis sgra
translated: His face, a lotus, is beautiful, like the moon,🔽and his eyes, like lotuses, are long, with clear white and black parts.🔽His hair, which is on his head, is dark like a bee,

original: brgyan bung ltar gnag_/bi'i rdzi 'dra snum zhing mdzod spu dung 'khyil ma/_/
analyzed: brgyan bung ltar gnag_/bi'i rdzi 'dra snum zhing mdzod spu dung 'khyil ma/_/
translated: and his eyebrows are oily, like those of a young antelope, and his eyelashes are curled like conches.🔽His two hands, which are the two truths, open like a blooming lotus,

original: bden gnyis phyag ni ud pal kha 'byed bdag sogs kyi/_/gti mug mun sel
analyzed: bden gnyis phyag ni ud pal kha 'byed bdag sogs kyi/_/gti mug mun sel
translated: and he dispels the darkness of ignorance in me and others.🔽In the center of the lotus of his heart,

original: snying gi chu skyes kha dbus na/_/ud pal g.yon bsnams ye shes rgyas mdzad
analyzed: snying gi chu skyes kha dbus na/_/ud pal g.yon bsnams ye shes rgyas mdzad
translated: he holds a lotus in his left hand, and he expands pristine wisdom.

original: g.yas pa yis/_/'gro rnams bung ba'i me tog sngon po kha 'byed ma/_/srid
analyzed: g.yas pa yis/_/'gro rnams bung ba'i me tog sngon po kha 'byed ma/_/srid
translated: With his right hand, he opens the blue lotus of beings,🔽and he is the one who opens the eyes of the world.

original: par lhungs nas mya ngan smre sngags 'don pa la/_/sems can don mdzad seng
analyzed: par lhungs nas mya ngan smre sngags 'don pa la/_/sems can don mdzad seng
translated: and the one who acts for the benefit of sentient beings,🔽the lion of men, rose from the forest of Sāl trees and came.

original: ldeng nags nas bzhengs la gshegs/_/lang tsho dar bab 'o ma rgyas pa'i nu
analyzed: ldeng nags nas bzhengs la gshegs/_/lang tsho dar bab 'o ma rgyas pa'i nu
translated: The one with a navel like a whorl,

original: 'bur can/_/sna tshhogs thabs kyis srid zhi g.yo zhing bskyod mdzad ma/_/khyu
analyzed: 'bur can/_/sna tshhogs thabs kyis srid zhi g.yo zhing bskyod mdzad ma/_/khyu
translated: with various methods, moves and shakes cyclic existence and peace,🔽the supreme she-wolf, with a lotus navel,

original: mchog spyang mo 'gying bag lte ba pad ma can/_/dza ti tsham pa li shi dri ngad bzang
analyzed: mchog spyang mo 'gying bag lte ba pad ma can/_/dza ti tsham pa li shi dri ngad bzang
translated: with the fragrance of nutmeg, camphor, and jasmine,🔽with hands and feet red like lotuses, unstained by the faults of cyclic existence,🔽adorned with upper and lower silk garments,

original: por ldan/_/phyag zhabs pad ma ltar dmar 'khor ba'i skyon ma gos/_/pan tsha🔽li ga lha dar stod smad brgyan byas ma/_/nyi tshhe'i sku min khyab pas thugs rje'i
analyzed: por ldan/_/phyag zhabs pad ma ltar dmar 'khor ba'i skyon ma gos/_/pan tsha li ga lha dar stod smad brgyan byas ma/_/nyi tshhe'i sku min khyab pas thugs rje'i
translated: not the body of the sun, but pervading with the body of compassionate activity,

original: 'phrin las sku/_/thub pas rgya mtshhor gsungs pa klu grub snying po yis/_/nags
analyzed: 'phrin las sku/_/thub pas rgya mtshhor gsungs pa klu grub snying po yis/_/nags
translated: the one seen by Nāgārjuna in the forest,

original: su gzigs so sems can dal gyis khur chen khyer/_/tshhangs tshhings srid pa'i
analyzed: su gzigs so sems can dal gyis khur chen khyer/_/tshhangs tshhings srid pa'i
translated: the one who carries the great burden of sentient beings slowly,🔽the one who liberates from the forest of cyclic existence,🔽the one who holds the form of a youthful maiden,🔽the one who is the mother of the buddhas of the three times,

original: nags nas zhi bar sgrol mdzad ma/_/bsgres mo gzhon nu'i tshhul 'dzin sangs
analyzed: nags nas zhi bar sgrol mdzad ma/_/bsgres mo gzhon nu'i tshhul 'dzin sangs
translated: the one who is the essence of the three secrets of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three kāyas of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three vajras of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three roots of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three jewels of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three trainings of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three vows of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three vehicles of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three realms of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three times of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three poisons of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three roots of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three kāyas of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three vajras of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three jewels of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three trainings of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three vows of all buddhas,🔽the one who is the essence of the three vehicles of

original: rgyas kun gyi phyi/_/ming tsham dran pa nyid kyis 'jigs las bskyob mdzad ma/_/
analyzed: rgyas kun gyi phyi/_/ming tsham dran pa nyid kyis 'jigs las bskyob mdzad ma/_/
translated: O mother of the bodhisattvas,🔽who are not discouraged by long remaining in cyclic existence,

original: yun / ring 'khor bar mi skyo zhi bar mi gnas pa'i/_/sa bcu'i dbang phyug rgyal
analyzed: yun / ring 'khor bar mi skyo zhi bar mi gnas pa'i/_/sa bcu'i dbang phyug rgyal
translated: who do not abide in peace,🔽and who are the lords of the ten grounds.

original: sras rnams kyi thugs rje ma/_/rje btshun yon tan mtha' yas bdag gis brjod
analyzed: sras rnams kyi thugs rje ma/_/rje btshun yon tan mtha' yas bdag gis brjod
translated: I cannot express the infinite qualities of the noble ones,

original: mi nus/_/kun tu rtogs spangs ye shes mnga' brnyes chos kyi sku/_/gzhan gyi
analyzed: mi nus/_/kun tu rtogs spangs ye shes mnga' brnyes chos kyi sku/_/gzhan gyi
translated: but I will praise the one who has attained the wisdom of abandoning all conceptualization, the dharmakāya,

original: don phyir sku ni seng ldeng nags na gshegs bzhud mdzad/_/srid las bdag
analyzed: don phyir sku ni seng ldeng nags na gshegs bzhud mdzad/_/srid las bdag
translated: who, for the sake of others, goes and returns from the forest of kṣīrikā trees,🔽and who, having liberated herself from existence,🔽praises the forest maiden.🔽You who go in the directions to the right and left,

original: grol nags kyi bu mo phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/'od zer ral cig ser sngo g.yas
analyzed: grol nags kyi bu mo phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/'od zer ral cig ser sngo g.yas
translated: with a single ray of yellow-blue light,

original: g.yon phyogs char gshegs/_/zhi khro'i phyag gnyis rdo rje a sho gri khug thogs/_/
analyzed: g.yon phyogs char gshegs/_/zhi khro'i phyag gnyis rdo rje a sho gri khug thogs/_/
translated: with two hands in the peaceful and wrathful forms, holding a vajra and a knife,🔽and who, in the past and future,

original: snga phyir bzhud cing dpe med gus ldan bsnyen bkur mdzad/_/mdzes ma nye
analyzed: snga phyir bzhud cing dpe med gus ldan bsnyen bkur mdzad/_/mdzes ma nye
translated: with incomparable devotion, make offerings,🔽I praise you, beautiful one, with a single ray of light.

original: 'khor 'od zer ral cig phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/sngon mchod phyi nas gdugs khur
analyzed: 'khor 'od zer ral cig phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/sngon mchod phyi nas gdugs khur
translated: You who made offerings in the past and carried an umbrella in the future,

original: rigs rgyal bu mo'i tshhogs/_/rnga yab ting shag rnga gling pi bang glu gar 'gengs//
analyzed: rigs rgyal bu mo'i tshhogs/_/rnga yab ting shag rnga gling pi bang glu gar 'gengs//
translated: with a yak-tail fan, cymbals, kettledrums, lutes, and songs and dances.🔽The fifteen celestial maidens, adorned with ornaments and beautiful garments,

original: lha'i bu mo bco lnga rgyan ldan na bza' mdzes/_/sna tshhogs sku yis mchod bsnams🔽rol la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/nags tshhal lha mo sku mdzes dge ma 'khor bcas la//
analyzed: lha'i bu mo bco lnga rgyan ldan na bza' mdzes/_/sna tshhogs sku yis mchod bsnams rol la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/nags tshhal lha mo sku mdzes dge ma 'khor bcas la//
translated: holding various offerings,🔽I pay homage and praise.🔽By this excellent, inexhaustible virtue of my praise🔽to the beautiful forest goddess, Śubhākarā, and her retinue,

original: bdag gis bstod bgyis mi bzad dge ba bzang po des/_/'gro ba kun la thugs
analyzed: bdag gis bstod bgyis mi bzad dge ba bzang po des/_/'gro ba kun la thugs
translated: may all beings,🔽their afflictions cleansed by the water of your compassion,

original: rje'i chu'i nyon mongs kun dag nas/_/srid pa'i nags nas zhi ba'i tshhal du phyin
analyzed: rje'i chu'i nyon mongs kun dag nas/_/srid pa'i nags nas zhi ba'i tshhal du phyin
translated: go from the forest of existence to the grove of peace.

original: par shog_/gzhon nu kha ti ta re ma la bstod pa tshhigs su bcad pa bcu drug pa/
analyzed: par shog_/gzhon nu kha ti ta re ma la bstod pa tshhigs su bcad pa bcu drug pa/
translated: The sixteen verses of praise to the young man Katipayapala

original: slob dpon 'phags pa klu grub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//🔽da
analyzed: slob dpon 'phags pa klu grub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_// da
translated: by Ācārya Ārya Nāgārjuna is complete.

original: ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma la bstod pa/
analyzed: ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma la bstod pa/
translated: Praise to Tārā of the Forest of Dhenkā
